CustomField.formula: Approved_Advance_Amount_Total__c - ( Origination_Fee_Subtotal__c + Advance_Fee_Subtotal__c + BPO_Appraisal_Fee_Subtotal__c + Doc_Prep_Fee_Subtotal__c + BlackSquare_Fee_Subtotal__c + Daily_Interest_Rate_Subtotal__c + Inspection_Fee_Subtotal__c )
CustomField.label: Net Funding Subtotal
